titleStmt.title: Wednesday the first of June, 1653. At the Councel of State at White-hall Whereas divers of the inhabitants of this Commonwealth did in the yeare 1642. and since issue forth considerable summes of money by way of adventure for lands forfeited in Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black Spread-Eagle, at the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread-Eagle, at the west-end of Pauls
